name: The Escape (itch) (ZeldaFan)
description:
"The Escape" is a small game about escaping a dark place. It was made for Brackeys game Jam 2021.1. Have fun!

Controls: WASD/ Arrow keys

Note: Please play the game in fullscreen, it won't work otherwise. I'm working on fixes.

I couldn't get the levels done in time, but this is what I got so far.

(The game was far more developed, but then it broke somehow. This is the last version I exported. The finished version will be released after the rating phase of Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1)
